page.title: 14SOAR VALLEY BUS
page.content: This{bus}provides a{service}not offered by public{transport. Operations began in Sept. 1979 organised by local{Parish Councils. About 60 people drive the{bus.}The original{bus}cost Â£17,000 and a new one in Sept will cost Â£24,000. The{bus can carry 16 adults or 24 children. {Rushcliffe Council}provide Senior Citizen passes and School passes are available at reduced prices.{Bus drivers need to take a test. Driving is a voluntary service but expenses can be claimed. In a year the{bus}will carry 11,000 passengers. The{Soar Valley Bus}is very successful, people have come from as far as{Hereford}to see why it is so.
